definition: to do/to grow/to write or compose/to pretend/to regard as/to feel/writings or works
abbr. for 日本[Ri4 ben3], Japan

sentences.english: This pizza parlor offers free delivery on weeknights.
sentences.chinese: 披薩店在工作日夜晚提供免費外送服務。

sentences.english: I didn't know them, but we just happened to be going the same pace.
sentences.chinese: 工作日也跑，只是路程不遠，我也不練速度。

sentences.english: In fact, I seldom get an extra break in my workday.
sentences.chinese: 事實上，在工作日內我很少有額外的休息。

sentences.english: This returns the respective number of days for that particular week day.
sentences.chinese: 這樣便返回此特別工作日的各自的天數。

sentences.english: I can use all kinds of translative tools (Trados). I am a professional, so I have enough time to work.
sentences.chinese: 我是一名自由職業者，日常工作日均有充足空閒時間。

sentences.english: I really like looking after Danielle during the week.
sentences.chinese: 在一週工作日內，我真的很喜歡照顧丹妮爾。

sentences.english: Transfers are not permitted within 10 working days of the test.
sentences.chinese: 若在考前10個工作日之內，改期是不允許的。

sentences.english: We are handling your complaints, and we will call you back in 3 to 7 working-days.
sentences.chinese: 你的投訴我們已經受理，三至七個工作日會給您迴音。

sentences.english: The Municipal Department of human resources protection shall complete the examination within 10 working days.
sentences.chinese: 市人力資源保障部門應當在10個工作日內完成審覈。

sentences.english: Who is impacted by my decision to change my work schedule?
sentences.chinese: 誰會受我工作日程改變的影響？

sentences.english: Please make a phone call in 15 workdays of future to our company.
sentences.chinese: 請在未來的15個工作日內打電話到我們公司。

sentences.english: Regular services usually take 4 working days after receipt of samples.
sentences.chinese: 常規服務指收到樣品起4個工作日後發出測試報告。

sentences.english: On a recent weekday she interrupted her workday to take her son to the doctor.
sentences.chinese: 最近一個工作日她忙裏偷閒帶兒子去看醫生。

sentences.english: Time lost through illness amounted to 1,357 working days.
sentences.chinese: 由於疾病而耽誤的工作日達到1357天。

sentences.english: What was your typical workday like at the firm?
sentences.chinese: 在公司上班的典型的工作日是什麼樣的？

definition: time of going to work/the morning rush hour
time interval/work shift/time slot/the twelve two-hour divisions of the day
to finish work/to get off work
